Holiday notice - Bitstamp EUR SEPA payments paused - 15.08.2023
Bitstamp EUR SEPA payments will be paused on Tuesday, August 15, 2023, due to a public holiday in the EU.

Due to the upcoming public holiday (Assumption of Mary) in the EU on Tuesday, August 15, 2023, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for EUR SEPA payments will not be available.

Instant SEPA transfers, GBP FPS transfers, USD deposits and withdrawals will be processed without interruptions.

Also, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will be unaffected.

All SEPA deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day—on August 16, 2023.

If you need any help or additional information, please contact us at  support@bitstamp.net.

We wish a happy Assumption Day to all our customers!
BANK HOLIDAY: August 15, 2023 – EUR SEPA payments paused
